T02D3600:225a-1: dhva j'a gra ki y'u r'a s'a dha na /
T02D3600:225a-3: rgyal mchan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs //
T02D3600:225a-4: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3600:225a-6: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan 'dud //
T02D3600:225b-0: de yi sgrub @225b thabs dngos grub phyir //
T02D3600:225b-1: bdag gis dad pas bri bar bya //
T02D3600:225b-2: dang por re zhig sngags pas zhal bsang ba la
T02D3600:225b-3: sogs pa byas nas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su
T02D3600:225b-4: stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3600:225b-5: mkhas pas byams pa la sogs pa'i yid dag pas
T02D3600:225b-6: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog bdud rnams
T02D3600:225b-7: 'joms shing g-yul las sgrol bar byed pa bsgom par
T02D3600:225b-8: bya'o // aom tsandr'arka bi m'a le sv'a h'a zhes
T02D3600:225b-9: pa'i sngags brjod nas rang gi snying gar aa yig
T02D3600:225b-10: yongs su gyur pa las zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D3600:225b-11: yang dag par sbyor ba'i steng du dham yig ser
T02D3600:225b-12: po'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su sangs rgyas
T02D3600:225b-13: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas nas /
T02D3600:225b-14: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi me tog la sogs pas
T02D3600:225b-15: yang dag par mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro
T02D3600:225b-16: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D3600:225b-17: de'i rjes la aom sva bha wa shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a
T02D3600:225b-18: wa shuddho& ham zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas skad cig
T02D3600:225b-19: gis stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3600:225b-20: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D3600:225b-21: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas nga rgyal bskyed
T02D3600:225b-22: nas sems can rnams gdon pa'i bsam pas gzugs brnyan
T02D3600:225b-23: bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma yang dag par
T02D3600:225b-24: sbyor ba'i steng du dhvam yig ser po'i 'od zer
T02D3600:225b-25: gyis mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la /
T02D3600:225b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i skus brgyan cing /
T02D3600:225b-27: de'i snying gar rab tu zhugs nas slar log ste /
T02D3600:225b-28: 'od zer gyi tshogs pas sa bon la rab tu zhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3600:225b-29: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las g-yul las
T02D3600:225b-30: sgrol bar byed pa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo
T02D3600:225b-31: yid du 'ong ba zhal pa zhib phyag bzhi pa
T02D3600:225b-32: khro zhing zhabs g-yon brkyang ba lto ba 'phyang ba
T02D3600:225b-34: dmar la zlum zhing mdzes pa /
T02D3600:225b-35: na bza' sngon po mnabs pa /
T02D3600:225b-37: 'khor lo phyag g-yas na bsnams pa /
T02D3600:225b-38: g-yon pa dag gis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa nag po dang /
T02D3600:225b-39: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gtun shing dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D3600:225b-40: sku'i phyogs g-yon du rtse gsum la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3600:225b-41: zhal dang po ni ser po'o //
T02D3600:226a-2: ral pa dmar ser gyen du brdzes shing bcings pa /
T02D3600:226a-4: padma dang nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs shing brtan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3600:226a-5: de bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas nyi
T02D3600:226a-6: ma la gnas pa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D3600:226a-7: zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs te yang
T02D3600:226a-9: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yi ges dgug pa dang /
T02D3600:226a-11: bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o //
T02D3600:226a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D3600:226a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes so //
T02D3600:226a-14: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D3600:226a-15: gshegs pa rnams kyis rang gi thugs ka nas rnam
T02D3600:226a-16: par 'phros pa'i bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i
T02D3600:226a-17: gser gyi bum pas phyag nas dbang bskur bzhin pa'i
T02D3600:226a-18: bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3600:226a-19: de la dbang bskur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o //
T02D3600:226a-20: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D3600:226a-21: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D3600:226a-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D3600:226a-23: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D3600:226a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3600:226a-25: de nas rab tu gang zhing yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bskyed la /
T02D3600:226a-26: sngags bzlas nas rtag tu bde ba'i tshig gis mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3600:226a-27: aom bha ga ba t'i dhva dz'a gra kee y'u
T02D3600:226a-28: re pa ra see n+ya bi dhvam sa na ka
T02D3600:226a-29: ri sva see n+ya pa ri pa la ni /
T02D3600:226a-30: au pa k'a mu khi kha kha kh'a hi kh'a
T02D3600:226a-31: hi par see n+ya aa nanda mu khe na aa
T02D3600:226a-32: nanda bhu dze na pra ha ra pra ha ra
T02D3600:226a-33: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3600:226a-35: aom sarba gra ha na kshe tra dhya mi ka ra ni sv'a h'a nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D3600:226a-36: phreng sngags ni gzungs las blta bar bya'o //
T02D3600:226a-38: khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D3600:226a-39: ji ltar rjes 'jug dngos grub stsol //
T02D3600:226a-40: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D3600:226a-41: slar yang 'dir ni byon par zhu //
T02D3600:226a-42: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis gshegs nas gnas par bya'o zhes so //
T02D3600:226a-43: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
